level.heading: Rulemaking.
level.text: In accordance with subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, the Mayor is authorized to promulgate rules and regulations as necessary to implement this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 707 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-28, see notes following ยง 49-1001.
